title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO PRINTING, LINING MACHINES, TYPEWRITERS, AND TO STAMPS

note.note-paragraph: This subclass constitutes an internal scheme for indexing only.

title-part.text: Arrangements for actuating or driving printing presses
Devices allowing two gears to engage with each other
Rotary energy transmitters, i.e. electric energy couplers
using pneumatic energy, e.g. pressurised air
Auxiliary devices or processes associated with the drives
Driving devices associated with particular installations or situations
Inching drive mechanism, i.e. to obtain stepwise movement
with means for deviating torque over the printing units
each printing unit being driven by its own electric motor, i.e. electric shaft
Means enabling or facilitating exchange of cylinders
with means for displacing the frame
with means for displacing the article
by increasing pressure above the screen
by increasing pressure beneath the screen
Devices or methods for reducing snap effect
Screen printing machines for particular purposes
Printing machines of special types or for particular purposes
Machines with modular units, i.e. with units exchangeable as a whole
Machines with double or multiple printing units for "flying" printing plates exchange
Machines with constructions allowing refurbishing, converting or updating existing presses
Machines with cylinders only supported on one side, e.g. cantilever construction
for printing a long repeat length on webs
for printing on the interior of hollow articles
internally, e.g. for mugs or goblets
Printing presses using a heated printing foil
Driving devices for the reciprocating die
Arrangements for moving, supporting or positioning the printing foil
Braking devices for the unwinding roll
Guiding or tensioning the printing foil
with means for attaching printing elements to the holder
Material or products to be decorated or printed
Converting existing presses to foil printing presses
Using more than one printing foil
Attaching several printing plates on one cylinder
Means enabling or facilitating exchange of tubular printing or impression members, e.g. printing sleeves, blankets
Means facilitating exchange of sleeves mounted on cylinders without removing the cylinder from the press
Detecting the correct position of printing plates on the cylinder
Adjusting means for printing plates on the cylinder
Forming the printing surface directly on the form cylinder
by using mixtures of ink and water or repellant
Arrangements for the operation of printing presses
by cutting the web in case of web break
by deviating the web in case of web break
by preventing the web winding up around cylinders
Measuring or controlling the consumption of ink
characterised by the methods or devices
Pressing the cleaning cloth against the cylinder
Selection of materials or products for cleaning
Details or accessories of printing machines not otherwise provided for
Manifolding, printing or duplicating for office purposes
